refsynopsisdiv.simpara: shapeclustering -D output_dir -U unicharset -O mfunicharset -F font_props -X xheights FILE…

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: shapeclustering(1) takes extracted feature .tr files (generated by tesseract(1) run in a special mode from box files) and produces a file shapetable and an enhanced unicharset. This program is still experimental, and is not required (yet) for training Tesseract.
